posts.post_content:

I'm interested in Gd+, VG or VG/EX cards I need for my set.  I'd also be interested in low grade e90-1s.  

Just looking to trade right now, but if you want to make an offer on the lot feel free.  


PM me and we can email.  Happy to send scans if you have something to trade.  

:D

I'm interested in a few of your cards.  [url]rnovak14@wi.rr.com[/url]

Thanks.

Ray Novak
